# Grammarly Design System

Complete component library for building Grammarly products.

**Documentation**: https://uifoundation.gpages.io/grammarly-design-system
**Package**: @grammarly/design-system
**Installation**: `npm install @grammarly/design-system` or `pnpm add @grammarly/design-system`

## Quick Start

```typescript
import { Button, TextField, Modal } from '@grammarly/design-system';
import '@grammarly/design-system/dist/index.css';
```

## Available Components (43)

### Accordion

**Import**: `import { Accordion } from '@grammarly/design-system';`

**Documentation**: https://uifoundation.gpages.io/grammarly-design-system/?path=/docs/gds-accordion

---

### Badge

**Import**: `import { Badge } from '@grammarly/design-system';`

**Key props**: getTooltipText, tabIndex, tooltipProps, tooltipContentProps

**variants**: neutral, business, addition, clarity, correctness, critical, deletion, delivery, engagement, plagiarism, premium, pro, success, warning

**Documentation**: https://uifoundation.gpages.io/grammarly-design-system/?path=/docs/gds-badge

---

---

### Button

**Import**: `import { Button } from '@grammarly/design-system';`

**Key props**: children, text, iconStart, iconEnd, isLoading and 1 more

**variants**: primary, secondary, tertiary, ghost, premium, critical, pro, enterprise

**sizes**: small, medium, large, xlarge, 2xlarge, 3xlarge, 4xlarge

**Documentation**: https://uifoundation.gpages.io/grammarly-design-system/?path=/docs/gds-button

### Illustration

**Import**: `import { Illustration } from '@grammarly/design-system';`

**Key props**: type, size, accessibilityLabel, colorMode

**illustrationTypes**: empty-birding, empty-cactus, empty-cookie, empty-hat, empty-painting, empty-plane, empty-sand, empty-scribe, empty-work, empty-write, success-birding, success-cactus, success-check, success-cookie, success-hat, success-painting, success-plane, success-sand, success-scribe, success-work, success-write, spot-celebrate, spot-issue, spot-chat-double, spot-chat-check, spot-doc-sparkles, spot-doc-award, spot-doc-magic, spot-doc-check, spot-doc-double-check, spot-doc-100, spot-chart-user, spot-target, spot-coin, spot-doc-on-brand, spot-chart-line-graph, spot-plagiarism, spot-detect-ai-text
